SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT epe.sku_id FROM erp_product_equipment epe INNER JOIN erp_order eo ON epe.order_no = eo.order_no AND eo.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_return_order_product erop ON erop.return_product_sku_id = epe.sku_id AND erop.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_return_order ero ON ero.id = erop.return_order_id AND ero.data_status=1 WHERE epe.order_no IS NOT NULL AND epe.order_no != ""
AND eo.buyer_customer_id = #{maps.customerId} ) epe

SELECT sku_main.*
em.material_type as product_material_material_type,mpcp.property_name AS sku_property_property_name,mpcpv.property_value_name AS sku_property_property_value_Name, em.material_name AS product_material_material_name,em.material_no AS product_material_material_no,em.material_capacity_value AS product_material_material_capacity_value, em.material_model_id AS product_material_material_model_id
FROM ( select ,ep.product_name from erp_product_sku eps left join erp_product ep on ep.id=eps.product_id where eps.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and eps.data_status = 1 ) sku_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsps ON epsps.sku_id = sku_main.id AND epsps.data_status = 1 AND epsps.is_sku = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property mpcp ON epsps.property_id = mpcp.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value mpcpv ON epsps.property_value_id = mpcpv.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_material epm ON epm.product_sku_id = sku_main.id AND epm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_material em on epm.material_id = em.id ORDER BY mpcp.data_order DESC,mpcpv.data_order DESC

SELECT sku_main.*
em.material_type as product_material_material_type,mpcp.property_name AS sku_property_property_name,mpcpv.property_value_name AS sku_property_property_value_Name, em.material_name AS product_material_material_name,em.material_no AS product_material_material_no,em.material_capacity_value AS product_material_material_capacity_value, em.material_model_id AS product_material_material_model_id
FROM ( SELECT
FROM erp_product_sku eps WHERE eps.product_id = #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND eps.data_status = 1 ) sku_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsps ON epsps.sku_id = sku_main.id AND epsps.data_status = 1 AND epsps.is_sku = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property mpcp ON epsps.property_id = mpcp.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value mpcpv ON epsps.property_value_id = mpcpv.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_material epm ON epm.product_sku_id = sku_main.id AND epm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_material em on epm.material_id = em.id ORDER BY mpcp.data_order DESC,mpcpv.data_order DESC

SELECT sku_main.*
em.material_type as product_material_material_type,mpcp.property_name AS sku_property_property_name,mpcpv.property_value_name AS sku_property_property_value_Name, em.material_name AS product_material_material_name,em.material_no AS product_material_material_no,em.material_capacity_value AS product_material_material_capacity_value, em.material_model_id AS product_material_material_model_id
FROM ( SELECT
FROM erp_product_sku eps WHERE eps.product_id = #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND eps.data_status = 1 ) sku_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsps ON epsps.sku_id = sku_main.id AND epsps.data_status = 1 AND epsps.is_sku = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property mpcp ON epsps.property_id = mpcp.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value mpcpv ON epsps.property_value_id = mpcpv.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_material epm ON epm.product_sku_id = sku_main.id AND epm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_material em on epm.material_id = em.id ORDER BY mpcp.data_order DESC,mpcpv.data_order DESC

select count(eps.id) from erp_product_sku eps inner join erp_product mp on eps.product_id = ep.id
and eps.product_id = #{maps.productSkuQueryParam.productId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ep.product_name like CONCAT('%','${maps.productSkuQueryParam.productName}','%' )
and eps.sku_name like CONCAT('%','${maps.productSkuQueryParam.skuName}','%' )
and eps.data_status = 1

SELECT eps.product_name as product_name,
em.material_type as product_material_material_type,mpcp.property_name AS sku_property_property_name,mpcpv.property_value_name AS sku_property_property_value_Name, em.material_name AS product_material_material_name,em.material_no AS product_material_material_no,em.material_capacity_value AS product_material_material_capacity_value, em.material_model_id AS product_material_material_model_id
FROM ( select ep.product_name as product_name,
from erp_product_sku eps inner join erp_product ep on eps.product_id = ep.id
and eps.product_id = #{maps.productSkuQueryParam.productId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ep.product_name like CONCAT('%','${maps.productSkuQueryParam.productName}','%' )
and eps.sku_name like CONCAT('%','${maps.productSkuQueryParam.skuName}','%' )
and eps.data_status = 1
LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.pageSize} ) eps LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsps ON epsps.sku_id = eps.id AND epsps.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property mpcp ON epsps.property_id = mpcp.id AND mpcp.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value mpcpv ON epsps.property_value_id = mpcpv.id AND mpcpv.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_material epm ON epm.product_sku_id = sku_main.id AND epm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_material em on epm.material_id = em.id ORDER BY eps.create_time DESC
